name: Self-Sufficient
text: You know how to get along in the wild and how to effectively treat wounds.
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Heal checks and Survival checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicText: Independence comes naturally to you, and you have mastered taking care of yourself.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Heal and Survival skill checks from Self-Sufficient increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Heal or Survival check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
text_zh: 你知道如何在野外生存和如何有效的治疗伤口。
benefit_zh: 你在医疗和生存技能检定上获得+2加值。如果某技能受训等级10以上，该技能获得的加值提升为+4。
mythicText_zh: 独立生存对你来说如同呼吸一样简单。
mythicBenefit_zh: 自给自足专长对医疗与生存技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次医疗或者生存检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。
